resources.string: \t\t\t\t\t\tNo internet Connection \nConnect to internet and try again.

"Laughter is the best medicine" - recommended by doctors near you! Everyday, we hear more and more about people attempting suicide because of depression, stress etc. I have decided to play my part to help support those individuals out. The goal of this app is to bring a smile on everyone\'s face by providing them jokes. To get a new joke, swipe down to refresh.

Note: This app was designed for educational and research purposes only. If this app is found being illegally sold and marketed on the Internet, please contact the developer by clicking on the logo above.\nNote: This app requires internet, additional data charges may apply.
For more info on the data source provider or any other query or concern, please contact the developer by clicking on the logo above.
